branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, CY3B, Magnetically Coupled (mm Stroke) - Basic Type
branchCategory.description: <p>The CY3B Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure.  The CY3B series has resin based lube retainers installed on the dust seal to more evenly distribute lubricant for a reduction in minimum operating pressure. 70% longer wear rings will distribute a side load over a larger contact area for improved bearing performance.  <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the CY3B must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Basic Type
Rodless Cylinder, CY3B, Magnetically Coupled (mm Stroke) - Basic Type

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, CY3B, Magnetically Coupled, (Basic)
branchItem.description: <p>The CY3B Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure.  The CY3B series has resin based lube retainers installed on the dust seal to more evenly distribute lubricant for a reduction in minimum operating pressure. 70% longer wear rings will distribute a side load over a larger contact area for improved bearing performance.  <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the CY3B must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, 12-CY3B, Clean Room, Magnetically Coupled (mm Stroke) - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>The 12-CY3B Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure. It uses fluorine grease making it inert to temperature fluctuations, chemical exposure and various gases which will not cause cracking or swelling in synthetic rubbers or elastomers qualifying it for ISO Class 5 (Class 100) clean room rating.  <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the 12-CY3B must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>
